name: Prison Architect Escape Mode Save File
summary: Learn about .ESCAPE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The ESCAPE file is created when you play the Escape game-mode in prison Architect. In this mode you play as a prisoner and try to escape a user-made prison or a prison from the Steam Workshop. This mode was released in version 1 on October 6th, 2015.

description: Save file created by Prison Architect, a game where players design and maintain high security prisons; contains saved game progress of an escape attempt, which includes the number of prisoners in your squadron and the amount of victims you hurt during your escape.
